axios.get("".concat(BACKENDURL,"/api/books")).then(res=>{setBooks(res.data);setLoading(false);}).catch(err=>{console.error("Error fetching books:",err);setLoading(false);});},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Loading books..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"explore-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Explore Books"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"subtitle",children:"Discover all available books in our collection."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"book-grid",children:books.map((book,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:book.cover||"https://via.placeholder.com/180x250",alt:book.title,className:"book-image",onError:e=>e.target.src="https://via.placeholder.com/180x250"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"author",children:["by ",book.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"rating",children:["\u2B50 ",book.rating?book.rating:"4.5"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"short-desc",children:book.description?book.description.slice(0,100)+"...":"No description available."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/book/".concat(book._id||book.id),className:"read-more-btn",children:"Read More"})]})]},book._id||book.id||index))})]});}export default Explore;
